data.title: 2024 Navy SEAL LT Michael P Murphy Run Around the Lake 4M Half Marathon
data.meta_description: 2024 Navy SEAL LT Michael P Murphy Run Around the Lake 4M Half Marathon
data.text:
Presented by

June 22, 2024

7AM Half Marathon

8:30AM Fun Run

9AM 4 Mile

Rain or Shine

EVENT PARKING + DAY OF RACE BIB PICK UP:

Ronkonkoma Train Station South Parking Lot

Easton St. & Railroad Ave.

Ronkonkoma, NY, 11779

*Spectators may park at the train station and take the bus to the start area as well - from

there they can walk to the finish area*

VIRTUAL UPLOAD TIMES & PHOTOS 6/22 -6/30

SWAG ITEMS SHIPPING BEGINS the Monday Prior to Race Day

Ronkonkoma Rotary's Run Around the Lake is Long Island's Largest Veteran Race.

This fundraiser to support our veterans honors Navy SEAL LT Michael P Murphy as well as other men and women who made great sacrifices to protect our nation!

AMENITIES

Please enjoy the BBQ & Beer after your Run Around the Lake!

First 250 Registrants for In-Person 4M + HM: get a Murphy Pint Glass

ALL 4M + HM Participants: get a t-shirt!

Half Marathoners: Receive a Finisher Medal

Bag Drop: There is a bag drop at the start of the common start line. Your belongings will be available for pickup there after the race. Please note that the Rotary does not take responsibility for any items and unclaimed bags will be donated.

ALL In-Person & Virtual Photos: Everyone will have access to a Finisher Certificate upon completion. Virtual runners will have the option to upload up to 5 photos along with a finisher time. In-Person runners will have access to Split & Finish line photos after the event.

Looking for more LT Murphy Run Around the Lake gear?

Click Below:

RAL GEAR

Questions about amenities Visit RunAroundTheLake.com

AWARDS

IN-PERSON 4 MILE

Top 3 Male/Female

Top 3 M/F Age Groups 14 & Under to 85+ in 5-year increments

Top 3 M/F Wheelchair

Top 3 TEAMS: Open & Uniformed Services

Lance Hugelmeyer Cup to Fastest Ronkonkoma M/F

Top 3 Clydesdale: 185-199 & 200+

Top 3 Athena: 145-159 & 160+

IN-PERSON HALF MARATHON

Top 3 Male/Female

Top 3 M/F Age Groups 14 & Under to 85+ in 5-year increments

Paul Dobiecki Spirit of the Run Award to Top M/F

Questions about awards Visit RunAroundTheLake.com

BENEFICIARIES

Click Here to See All Our Beneficiaries

BIB PICKUP

Hurry; Register 3 weeks in advance to get a personalized Race Number!

You must know your bib number in order to pick up your bib. If you do not know your bib number click on Bib Lookup above.

If you register more than 24 hours in advance, your bib number will be texted or emailed to you at least 2 hours prior to bib pickup.

If you register within 24 hours of bib pickup you will be texted your bib number within 90 seconds or click on Bib Lookup above.

Thurs. June 20 - 4PM-9PM

St. Joseph's Church - GYM

45 Church St, Ronkonkoma

PASTA Dinner is 6PM - 8PM in Carew Hall

PARK ACROSS FROM CHURCH - SOUTH SIDE OF CHURCH ST

Fri. June 21 - 12PM-8PM

St. Joseph's Church - GYM

45 Church St, Ronkonkoma

PARK ACROSS FROM CHURCH - SOUTH SIDE OF CHURCH ST

IF YOU REGISTERED AFTER WEDNESDAY JUNE 19

PLEASE BRING YOUR TEXT OR EMAIL WITH YOUR BIB NUMBER TO PACKET PICKUP

IF YOU DIDN'T GET A TEXT/EMAIL CLICK ON BIB LOOKUP ABOVE

Race Day Bib Pickup (Also SEE PARKING & SHUTTLE BELOW)

Half Marathon Bib Pickup begins 6AM

4M Bib Pickup begins 7AM

Easton St. & Railroad Ave. Ronkonkoma

Virtual: If you don't get your bib in the mail, please use the live chat at elitefeats.com, and we'll send a new one after confirming your shipping address (include an apartment number if applicable)

COURSE / PORTABLES / WATER + ELECTROLYTE STOPS

4 Mile, Half Marathon & Fun Run Maps are available below. Please be aware of the Legend notating the run/walk routes, the bus route and the walk route from the bus to the start line.

Porta Potties will be available every 1.5 Miles.

Water Stops will be available every 1 Mile.

2 Electrolyte Stops for Half Marathoners on each loop. (3 Loops to complete)

NEW! Bag Drop: There is a bag drop at the start of the common start line. Your belongings will be available for pickup there after the race. Please note that the Rotary does not take responsibility for any items and unclaimed bags will be donated.

9AM START / 4 MILE RUN/WALK:

Will start on Ocean Ave.

Will finish at the traditional finish.

7AM START / HALF MARATHON 3 Loops to complete:

Will start on Ocean Ave.

Will finish at the traditional finish.

8:30AM / Fun Run

Will start on Ocean Ave.

Will finish on Kirk Ave.

HOTELS

Need a Hotel or lodging?

VIRTUAL PARTICIPANTS

Upload your times & photos beginning 6/22 - 6/30

TRACKING YOUR DISTANCE 4 Laps to one Mile on a Track

Treadmill

MapMyRun.com

Find a Certified USATF Course

Some events display course maps at elitefeats.com

Many parks have measured 'fitness' trails open to the public

Download free app Strava & hit 'Record'

HOW TO POST TIMES 1. Cover ground whenever & wherever you'd like!

2. On Start Date visit elitefeats.com/Results - search this event.

3. Search your name - click Update.

4. Enter your time.

5. Optional upload up to 5 photos.

WHEN TO POSTEARLY REGISTRANTS (before start day) can start posting times ON start day!

LATE REGISTRANTS (after start day) allow up to 24 hours to post times.

BIB MAILING begins Monday prior to start day. If you register after this, please allow 3-5 business days to receive.

You don't need the bib to participate, it's a keepsake!
